A Simple Bookmark
Manager

A clean and simple interface to organize your favourite
websites. Open a new browser tab and see your sites load
instantly. Try it for free.

Features

Our aim is to make it quick and easy for you to access your
favourite websites. Your bookmark sync between your devices
so you can access them on the go.

Features

Organize your bookmarks however like. Oursimple drag-and-drop interface gives you completecontrol over how you manage your favourite sites.

Intelligent search

Our powerful search feature will help you find savesites in no time at all. No need to trawl through all ofyour bookmarks.

Share your bookmarks

Easily share your bookmarks and collections withothers. Creates a shareable link that you can send atthe click of a button.
